Summary: This is a nice establishment. Clean rooms, nice amenities, great staff and management. I’ve stayed here twice in November and October of 2022. With no problems. The beds are comfortable and if you need a microwave, you have an option to book a suite or you can use the community microwave in the washer and drier room. It’s in a great little hub of Garden Grove with plenty of great places to eat. If you decide to stay there check out the restaurants at Euclid and Garden Grove Blvd, you won’t be disappointed.   I recommend if your in town and looking for a place, its worth a stay.

Summary Heading: probably one of the best budget hotels ive stayed in.
Summary: clean, with mini fridges, with nice decor. painless check-in without deposit, although online they say they do charge a deposit, so call ahead. the staff was friendly and concise. i also booked last minute! i liked it.

Hey, party people. This motel is awesome. The rooms have a refrigerator, tv, and AC. Pro Tip: There is a public microwave behind the vending machine. There are plenty of places to eat nearby. There are two washers and two dryers for guests to use as well.

Had to modify our trip to Disneyland, so this hotel was available, The owners were very nice. We had an upstairs king bedroom. Clean and quiet with a refrigerator. Nice strong wifi too, it is about a 10 minute drive to Disneyland, but there are a lot of eating places along the way and what was especially good was a Costco for gas. if i had to, i wouldn't mind staying here again.

Summary Heading: Surprise at the luxury of our room
Summary: This room was far better than our Vegas strip hotels.  Big refrigerator, mico, plush carpet, new furniture,/ desk.  New AC.  The room was completely NEW and REMODELED.  We felt like a Royalty.  In fact after our San Diego visit we re-booked a room again.
